com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan

Class ElementBuilder<P extends ParentElement<? extends Element>,C extends Element>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan.ElementBuilder<P,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - is the type of the Parent Element which this builder produces.
    C - is the type of Elements to which the Strategy applies.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultPhaseBuilder, DefaultPlanBuilder

    public abstract class ElementBuilder<P extends ParentElement<? extends Element>,C extends Element>
extends java.lang.Object
    An ElementBuilder allows the construction of a composite element such that the description of dependencies constructs a custom Strategy.
